message:
It's not only judges and juries that don't understand.  
“When I’m testifying in a trafficking case, which is fairly common these days, it’s really clear that judges and juries do not really understand the difference between prostitution and sex trafficking,” said Cooper.

data.description: Human trafficking is now a multi-billion-dollar industry worldwide.
data.title: Human Trafficking Is an Epidemic in the U.S. It's Also Big Business
